definition[0]: a line on a piece of cloth, paper etc where it has been folded, crushed, or pressed
example[0]: She smoothed the creases from her skirt.
example[1]: I’ll have to iron out the creases.
definition[2]: the line where the player has to stand to hit the ball in cricket
definition[3]: to become marked with a line or lines, or to make a line appear on cloth, paper etc by folding or crushing it
example[3]: Don’t sit on my newspaper. You’ll crease it!
example[5]: A worried frown creased her forehead.
